original_text: [siegel] and co-writers lisa bazadona and grace woodard have relied too much on convention in creating the characters who surround frankie .
generated_text:
1. "[paul schrader] and co-writers have relied too much on clichés in crafting the story."
2. "The filmmakers have played it too safe, relying on familiar tropes instead of taking risks."
3. "The writers have stuck to the beaten path, neglecting to add any real depth to the characters."
4. "The script relies too heavily on predictable plot devices, failing to surprise or engage the audience."
